alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:08AM MST until February 22 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally high amounts above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways with blowing snow and periods of moderate snowfall impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin
